code: import{UPDATE_CURRENT_USERS}from"./serverDataTypes";import{UPDATE_USER_ACTIVITY}from"./serverDataTypes";import{UPDATE_TEXT}from"./serverDataTypes";export var currentUsers=function currentUsers(payload){return{type:UPDATE_CURRENT_USERS,payload:payload};};export var userActivity=function userActivity(payload){return{type:UPDATE_USER_ACTIVITY,payload:payload};};export var text=function text(payload){return{type:UPDATE_TEXT,payload:payload[0]};};
